name: Purrfect Apawcalypse IF0
description:
This is Kemono high, 25 years ago from the present day. Miles a young genius, is troubled by Oscar's recruiting and Daisy's tailing. One day, Daisy notices that the door to the basement of the school is open, and she took Miles down to the basement. They pass through a mysterious portal that appears in the basement, and what they find is... a frightening another dimension! Oscar and a mysterious lost puppy join them on a great adventure through another dimension! Will they be able to return to their home world safely?

This game is the PA series Fan-game!! Play the origin-series here!
AND Play the IF-series first game here!

This game  is an apocalyptic dog dating dog your own dogventure fiction game. Trigger warnings include cartoon gore, bifurcated dogs, headless dogs, generally dogs not having a great time. Play at your own discretion! 
Almost music, Art and programming by Rawfish, Some music by 90%studios. created using Renpy!
